posts.post_content: For those who missed the reference, this is a Timespiral card which are intended to represent some futuristic and some older cards. This one is a reference to the card [brass man](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=2025).

posts.post_content: The only way this card is worth anything is for things that require cheap artifacts to sacrifice, and flavorwise, because this has a very definite feel of having to wind something before it will function, and I think they did a good job of conveying that. Otherwise, crap.

Posted By: Eddie_Antilles (7/22/2012 1:26:27 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@DaaNz  
Really? It's meant for constructed play obviously, and it's a colorless flier, which is always relevant. The single colorless mana a turn isnt a terrible price to pay for one danage a turn, not to mention his first free attack. Unlike [Brass Man](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brass Man), he can also be relevant late game. If he proves irrelevant just stop untapping him, or leave him untapped to block.  
  
Really not amazing but in lImited there's nothing really wrong with hitting in for one damage a turn. Oh yeah and the art is awesome.  
3/5
